statements.select:
SELECT CASE TL.LINE_STATUS WHEN 0 THEN '未执行' WHEN 1 THEN '已下达' WHEN 2 THEN '执行中' WHEN 3 THEN '已完成' ELSE '已取消' END AS STATUS_NAME, T1.*, TL.*, CASE WHEN SL.LOC_NAME IS NULL THEN TL.SLOC_NO ELSE SL.LOC_NAME END AS SLOC_NAME, CASE WHEN EL.LOC_NAME IS NULL THEN TL.ELOC_NO ELSE EL.LOC_NAME END AS ELOC_NAME FROM WBS_ORDER T1 INNER JOIN WBS_ORDER_LINE TL ON T1.ORDER_NO = TL.ORDER_NO AND TL.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' LEFT JOIN PSB_LOC SL ON TL.SLOC_NO = SL.LOC_NO LEFT JOIN PSB_LOC EL ON TL.ELOC_NO = EL.LOC_NO WHERE TL.LINE_STATUS < 3 AND TL.REQUIRE_QTY > TL.SHIP_QTY AND T1.ORDER_TYPE_MODULE = 'O'
T1.ORDER_NO LIKE '%' || #where.OrderNo# || '%'
T1.ORDER_STATUS = #where.Kind#
T1.CREATION_DATE >= #where.BeginDate#
T1.CREATION_DATE <= #where.EndDate#
ORDER BY TL.CREATION_DATE DESC

SELECT CASE TL.LINE_STATUS WHEN 0 THEN '未执行' WHEN 1 THEN '已下达' WHEN 2 THEN '执行中' WHEN 3 THEN '已完成' ELSE '已取消' END AS STATUS_NAME, T1.*, TL.LIMIT_BIN_NO, TL.ELOC_NO, TL.LIMIT_PALLET_ID, TL.LIMIT_PRODUCT_GUID, TL.LIMIT_DATE_START, TL.Limit_Date_End, TL.DELETE_FLAG, TL.ORDER_LINE_GUID, TL.LINE_ID, TL.SORT_ID, TL.MATERIAL_NO, TL.REQUIRE_QTY, TL.DELETE_FLAG, TL.ACT_QTY, TL.SHIP_QTY, TL.LINE_PRIORITY, TL.LINE_TASK_FLAG, TL.BIN_ERR_DESC, TL.LOCK_END_LOC, CASE WHEN SL.LOC_NAME IS NULL THEN TL.SLOC_NO ELSE SL.LOC_NAME END AS SLOC_NAME, CASE WHEN EL.LOC_NAME IS NULL THEN TL.ELOC_NO ELSE EL.LOC_NAME END AS ELOC_NAME FROM WBS_ORDER T1 INNER JOIN WBS_ORDER_LINE TL ON T1.ORDER_NO = TL.ORDER_NO AND TL.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' LEFT JOIN PSB_LOC SL ON TL.SLOC_NO = SL.LOC_NO LEFT JOIN PSB_LOC EL ON TL.ELOC_NO = EL.LOC_NO
t1.ORDER_NO = #where.OrderNo#
ORDER BY $OrderString$
